|- wi(w0, wceq(ciun(s0, c0, c1), ciun(s0, c0, cdif(c1, ciun(s1, co(nat1, cfzo, cv(s0)), c2)))))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wi(w0, wo(wceq(c0, cn), wceq(c0, co(nat1, cfzo, c3))))
-| wnfc(s0, c2)

comment: Rewrite a countable union as a disjoint union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Feb-2017.)
